Cash and Equivalents: cash and cash equivalents at carrying value
Inventory: inventory finished goods net of reserves
inventory work in process and raw materials net of reserves
Marketable Securities (Short-term): debt securities available for sale excluding accrued interest current
Prepaid and Other Current Assets: prepaid expense and other assets current
Receivables: notes and loans receivable net current
trade and loans receivables held for sale net not part of disposal group

Other Non-Current Assets: defined benefit plan assets for plan benefits noncurrent
notes and loans receivable net noncurrent
operating lease right of use asset
Property, Plant, and Equipment (net): property plant and equipment and finance lease right of use asset accumulated depreciation and amortization
property plant and equipment and finance lease right of use asset after accumulated depreciation and amortization
property plant and equipment and finance lease right of use asset before accumulated depreciation and amortization

Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income: accumulated other comprehensive income loss net of tax
Common Stock and APIC: common stock including additional paid in capital
common stocks including additional paid in capital
Total Equity: stockholders equity including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest

Accounts Payable and Accrued Expenses: accrued liabilities and other liabilities current

Other Non-Current Liabilities: pension and other postretirement defined benefit plans liabilities noncurrent

__unmapped__: accounts notes and loans receivable net current
long term debt and capital lease obligations
notes and loans receivable and net investment in lease held for investment net current
notes and loans receivable and net investment in lease net current
